parameter.name: eventGenerationProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability to generate a new event

parameter.name: eventsGenerationMaxPeriod
parameter.displayName: Max period for stores events generation

parameter.name: updatesPerPeriod
parameter.displayName: Store updates per period

parameter.name: unblockProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability that a store unblocks on heartbeat reception

parameter.name: messagesPerTick
parameter.displayName: Max number of messages a Relay can send per Tick

parameter.name: heartbeatRatePeriods
parameter.displayName: Store heartbeat rate (in number of periods)

parameter.name: loadColorScale
parameter.displayName: Load color scale

parameter.name: tickAccuracy
parameter.displayName: Tick accuracy

parameter.name: randomSeed
parameter.displayName: Default Random Seed

parameter.name: relayJoinMaxPeriod
parameter.displayName: Last period for relays to join

parameter.name: relayJoinProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability that [0,Max] relays join every period

parameter.name: blockProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability that a store blocks on heartbeat reception

parameter.name: relaysNumber
parameter.displayName: Number of relays

parameter.name: lossProbability
parameter.displayName: Wave loss probability

parameter.name: followProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability that a store follows on heartbeat reception

parameter.name: unfollowProbability
parameter.displayName: Probability that a store unfollows on heartbeat reception

parameter.name: wavePropagationDistance
parameter.displayName: Wave Propagation Distance

parameter.name: latencyRatio
parameter.displayName: Latency ratio (% of period)

parameter.name: relayJoinMaxNumber
parameter.displayName: Max number of joining relays (per period)

parameter.name: spaceHeight
parameter.displayName: Space Height

parameter.name: spaceWidth
parameter.displayName: Space width

parameter.name: storeToHighlight
parameter.displayName: Store for which to highlight directed and transitive followee

parameter.name: storeLoadColorScale
parameter.displayName: Stores load color scale
